src: Sieltä pohjoiseen ja helposti saavutettavissa on romanttinen ja kiehtova Sintran kaupunki. Ulkomaalaiset oppivat tuntemaan sen lordi Byronin kirjoittamasta ylistävästä selostuksesta, jossa hän kuvasi sen loistoa. ScottUrbin linja-auto 403 kulkee säännöllisesti Sintraan ja pysähtyy Cabo da Rocassa. Pohjoisen suunnalla kannattaa käydä myös suuressa Fatiman Neitsyt Marian pyhätössä, joka on maailmanlaajuisesti kuuluisa Marian ilmestymisestä.
mt: To the north and easily accessible is the romantic and charming city of Sintra. Foreigners learn to know it from Lord Byron's praising description, where he described its splendor. ScottUrbin bus line 403 runs regularly to Sintra and stops at Cabo da Roca. To the north it is also worth visiting the large Fatima Sanctuary of the Virgin Mary, which is famous worldwide for the apparition of Mary.
ref: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron. Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca. Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.

src: Vuonna 1994 etnisesti armenialainen Nagorno-Karabakhin alue Azerbaidžanissa kävi sodan azereita vastaan. Armenialaisten tuella luotiin uusi tasavalta. Yksikään vakiintunut valtio – edes Armenia – ei tunnusta sitä virallisesti. Diplomaattiset kiistat alueen hallinnasta vahingoittavat edelleen Armenian ja Azerbaidžanin välisiä suhteita.
mt: 1994, the Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan fought a war against the Azeris with the help of Armenians. A new republic was created with the help of Armenians. No established state – not even Armenia – officially recognizes it. Diplomatic disputes over the administration of the region still damage the relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
ref: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris. With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it. Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.

src: Yksi Pohjois-Carolinan Charlotten hyvistä puolista on se, että siellä on paljon korkealaatuisia vaihtoehtoja lapsiperheille. Muilta alueilta tulleet asukkaat mainitsevat usein perheystävällisyyden päällimmäiseksi syyksi kaupunkiin muuttamiseen, ja monien kävijöiden mielestä kaupungista on helppo nauttia lasten kanssa. Viimeisen 20 vuoden aikana lapsille sopivien vaihtoehtojen määrä Charlotten ydinkeskustan ulkopuolella on kasvanut räjähdysmäisesti. Perheet eivät yleensä käytä takseja Charlottessa, mutta niistä voi olla joissakin tilanteissa hyötyä. Yli kahdesta matkustajasta peritään lisämaksu, joten vaihtoehto saattaa olla tarpeettoman kallis.
mt: One of North Carolina's best things is that there are many high-quality options for families. Newcomers often cite family-friendliness as the main reason for moving to the city, and many visitors feel that it is easy to enjoy with children. In the last 20 years, the number of options for families outside the city center has exploded. Families rarely use taxis in Charlotte, but they can be useful in some situations. More than two passengers incur an additional charge, so the option may be too expensive.
ref: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families. Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around. In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially. Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances. There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.

src: Ennen kuin espanjalaiset saapuivat 1500-luvulla, Pohjois-Chile oli inkojen vallan alla, ja alkuperäiskansa araucanialaiset (mapuchet) asutti Keski- ja Etelä-Chileä. Mapuchet olivat myös yksi Amerikan viimeisistä itsenäisistä alkuperäiskansoista, eikä heitä ollut täysin alistettu espanjankielisten valtaan ennen Chilen itsenäistymistä. Vaikka Chile julistautui itsenäiseksi vuonna 1810 (muutamaksi vuodeksi Espanjan ilman toimivaa keskushallintoa jättäneiden Napoleonin sotien aikana), lopullinen voitto Espanjasta saatiin vasta vuonna 1818.
mt: Before the Spanish arrived in the 1500s, Northern Chile was under the rule of the Incas, and the original Araucanians (mapuches) inhabited Central and Southern Chile. The mapuches were also one of the last independent original peoples of the Americas, and they were not fully subjugated by the Spanish-speaking powers until Chile's independence in 1818.
ref: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.

Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.

src: Cinque Terre, joka tarkoittaa viittä maata, koostuu viidestä pienestä Ligurian alueella italiassa sijaitsevasta rannikkokylästä. Ne ovat Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza ja Monterosso. Ne kuuluvat Unescon maailmanperintökohteiden luetteloon. Vuosisatojen kuluessa ihmiset ovat huolellisesti rakentaneet terasseja rosoiseen ja jyrkkään maastoon aivan merenrannan jyrkänteille asti. Näkyvän kaupallistumisen puute on osa sen viehätystä. Polut, junat ja laivat yhdistävät kyliä, eivätkä autot pääse niihin ulkopuolelta käsin.
mt: Cinque Terre, which means five lands, consists of five small Ligurian villages on the Italian Riviera. They are Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso. They are listed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Over the centuries people have carefully built terraces into the steep, rocky landscape right up to the sea. The lack of visible commercialization is part of its charm. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot get there from outside.
ref: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria. They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea. Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.

src: Yleisin syy talvionnettomuuksille on teiden, jalkakäytävien ja erityisesti portaiden liukkaus. Tarvitset vähintään jalkineet, joissa on sopivat pohjat. Kesäkengät ovat yleensä hyvin liukkaat jään ja lumen päällä, ja jotkin talvikengätkin ovat puutteellisia. Kuvion tulisi olla tarpeeksi syvä, 5 mm (1/5 tuumaa) tai enemmän, ja materiaalin tarpeeksi pehmeä kylmiin lämpötiloihin. Joissakin kengissä on nastoja, ja liukkaita kelejä varten on saatavilla nastoitettuja liukuesteitä, jotka sopivat useimpiin kenkiin ja saappaisiin. Ne kiinnitetään joko korkoon ja kengänpohjaan tai pelkästään korkoon. Koron tulisi olla matala ja leveä. Hiekkaa, soraa tai suolaa (kalsiumkloridi) on usein siroteltu teille ja poluille pidon parantamiseksi.
mt: The most common cause of winter accidents is the slipperiness of roads, sidewalks, and especially stairs. You need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, and some winter shoes are inadequate. The tread should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material should be soft enough for cold temperatures. Some shoes have studs, and there are stud-equipped traction devices available for most shoes and boots. They are attached either to the sole and shoe bottom or just to the sole. The tread should be low and wide. Sand, gravel, or salt (calcium chloride) is often sprinkled on roads and paths for traction.
ref: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps. At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient. The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures. Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole. Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.

src: Cookinsaaret on Polynesiassa, Eteläisellä Tyynellämerellä sijaitseva saarivaltio. Se on Uuden-Seelannin liitännäisvaltio. Se on saaristo, jossa on 15 saarta yli 2,2 miljoonan neliökilometrin valtamerialueella. Koska saaret ovat samalla aikavyöhykkeellä kuin Havaiji, niitä kutsutaan joskus eteläisen pallonpuoliskon Havaijiksi. Vaikka ne ovat Havaijia pienempiä, ne tuovat eräille iäkkäille vierailijoille mieleen Havaijin ennen kuin siitä tuli osavaltio ja ennen kaikkia suuria turistihotelleja ja muuta kehitystä. Cookinsaarilla ei ole ainuttakaan kaupunkia, vaan ne koostuvat viidestätoista eri saaresta. Pääsaaret ovat Rarotonga ja Aitutaki.
mt: Cook Islands is a country in the South Pacific Ocean, in free association with New Zealand. It is a self-governing parliamentary democracy, and in 1965 the country became a freely associated state with New Zealand. Although Cook Islands became independent in 1965, the country and New Zealand share a relationship similar to that between Commonwealth realms. The Cook Islands' Head of State is Queen Elizabeth II and the Head of Government is the Prime Minister, Henry Puna. In 2006, the Cook Islands became the first nation ever to ratify the Treaty of Waitangi, which was signed in 1840 by the Māori people and the United Kingdom.
ref: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."

src: Luvat täytyy varata etukäteen. Sirenassa yöpymiseen tarvitaan lupa. Sirena on ainoa puistonvartijoiden asema, jossa tarjotaan leiriytymisen lisäksi majoitusta makuusaleissa ja lämpimiä aterioita. La Leona, San Pedrillo ja Los Patos tarjoavat vain leiriytymistä ilman ruokapalveluita. Puistoluvat on mahdollista saada suoraan Puerto Jiménezin metsänhoitokeskuksesta, mutta siellä ei voi maksaa luottokortilla Puistopalvelu (MINAE) myöntää puistolupia korkeintaan kuukautta ennen aiottua saapumisaikaa. CafeNet El Sol tarjoaa varauspalvelua 30 Yhdysvaltojen dollarin hintaan tai päivälippuja 10 dollarin hintaan. Tarkempia tietoja löytyy sen Corcovado-sivulta.
mt: Reservations must be made in advance. A permit is required to camp. Sirena is the only ranger station where lodging and meals are offered. La Leona, San Pedrillo and Los Patos only offer camping without meals. Permits can be obtained directly from the Puerto Jiménez forest station, but you cannot pay by credit card. MINAE (Ministerio de Ambiente y Energía) grants permits no more than a month before the intended arrival date. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for $30 USD or day passes for $10 USD. More information can be found on its Corcovado page.
ref: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service. It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.

src: Reppumatkailu suksin: tätä toimintaa kutsutaan myös erähiihdoksi, hiihtovaellukseksi tai retkihiihdoksi. Se on sukua alppihiihtotyyliselle retkeilylle tai vuorikiipeilylle, mutta siihen ei yleensä kuulu sellaista, koska jälkimmäistä harrastetaan jyrkässä maastossa, ja se vaatii paljon jäykemmät sukset ja monot. Ajattele hiihtoreittiä ikään kuin samanlaisena vaellusreittinä. Hyvissä olosuhteissa voit edetä jonkin verran nopeammin kuin jalkaisin, mutta pääset vain hyvin harvoin samaan vauhtiin kuin hiihtäessäsi huolletuilla laduilla ja ilman painavaa reppua.
mt: Cross-country skiing: This activity is also known as freeriding, ski touring or ski trekking. It is similar to alpine touring or rock climbing, but does not usually involve the same level of difficulty, as it is done in less steep terrain, and requires stiffer skis and bindings. Imagine a ski trail as a hiking trail. In good conditions you can move along at a faster pace than on foot, but you will never reach the same speed as on groomed trails and without a heavy pack.
ref: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking. It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots. Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route. In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.

src: Paluušokki iskee aiemmin kuin kulttuurišokki (totutteluvaihe on lyhyempi), kestää pidempään ja voi olla vakavampi. Matkailijoiden, joiden oli helppo mukautua uuteen kulttuuriin, on joskus erityisen hankalaa sopeutua taas omaan kotikulttuuriinsa. Kun palaat kotiin ulkomailla asumisen jälkeen, olet sopeutunut uuteen kulttuuriin ja menettänyt joitakin kotikulttuurisi tapoja. Kun ensiksi menit ulkomaille, ihmiset olivat todennäköisesti kärsivällisiä ja ymmärtäväisiä tietäessään, että matkustajien tarvitsee tottua uuteen maahan. Ihmiset eivät välttämättä käsitä, että kärsivällisyys ja ymmärrys ovat myös tärkeitä kotiin palaaville matkaajille.
mt: A return shock hits sooner than a culture shock (the adaptation phase is shorter), lasts longer and can be more serious. It is often particularly difficult for travelers to adapt to their own culture again after having adapted to a new culture. When you return home after living abroad, you have adapted to the new culture and have lost some of your own culture's habits. When you first went abroad, people were likely to be patient and understanding knowing that travelers need to adapt to the new country. People may not realize that patience and understanding are also important for travelers returning home.
ref: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe. Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture. When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture. When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt. People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.

src: Paluušokki iskee aiemmin kuin kulttuurišokki (totutteluvaihe on lyhyempi), kestää pidempään ja voi olla vakavampi. Matkailijoiden, joiden oli helppo mukautua uuteen kulttuuriin, on joskus erityisen hankalaa sopeutua taas omaan kotikulttuuriinsa. Kun palaat kotiin ulkomailla asumisen jälkeen, olet sopeutunut uuteen kulttuuriin ja menettänyt joitakin kotikulttuurisi tapoja. Kun ensiksi menit ulkomaille, ihmiset olivat todennäköisesti kärsivällisiä ja ymmärtäväisiä tietäessään, että matkustajien tarvitsee tottua uuteen maahan. Ihmiset eivät välttämättä käsitä, että kärsivällisyys ja ymmärrys ovat myös tärkeitä kotiin palaaville matkaajille.

src: Hirvet eivät ole luonnostaan aggressiivisia, mutta puolustavat itseään epäillessään vaaraa. Kun ihmiset eivät koe hirviä mahdollisesti vaarallisiksi, he saattavat lähestyä niitä liikaa ja asettaa itsensä vaaraan.
mt: Deer are not naturally aggressive, but will defend themselves if they feel threatened. When people do not perceive deer as dangerous, they may approach them too closely and put themselves in danger.
ref: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

src: Matkustajat saattavat nähdä päivän kuumuudessa kangastuksia, jotka luovat harhakuvan vedestä (tai jostakin muusta). Ne voivat olla vaarallisia, jos matkailija pyrkii kohti kangastusta hukaten kallisarvoista energiaa ja jäljellä olevaa vettä. Jopa kuumimmat autiomaat voivat olla äärimmäisen kylmiä yöllä. Hypotermia on todellinen riski ilman lämpimiä vaatteita.
mt: Passengers may see mirages in the heat of the day, which create false images of water (or something else). They can be dangerous if the traveler attempts to move towards the mirage, wasting valuable energy and remaining water. Even the hottest deserts can be extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.
ref: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water. Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.

src: Dominikaaninen tasavalta (espanjaksi República Dominicana) on Karibianmeren maa, joka muodostaa itäpuolen Haitin kanssa jakamastaan Hispaniolan saaresta. Valkoisten hiekkarantojen ja vuoristomaisemien ohella maassa on Amerikan vanhin eurooppalainen kaupunki, joka on nykyisin osa Santo Domingoa. Tainot ja karibit olivat saaren ensimmäiset asukkaat. Karibit olivat arawakkikieltä puhuva kansa, joka oli tullut saarelle noin vuonna 10 000 eaa. Espanjalaisvalloittajat olivat pienentäneet tainojen väkilukua huomattavasti vain muutaman vuoden kuluessa eurooppalaisten tutkimusmatkailijoiden saapumisesta Dominikaaniveli Bartolomé de las Casasin mukaan (Tratado de las Indias) espanjalaisvalloittajat surmasivat vuosien 1492 ja 1498 välillä noin 100 000 tainoa.
mt: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a nation on the Caribbean island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti. The country is the site of the first European settlement in the Americas, Santo Domingo, which was founded by Christopher Columbus in 1492. The Taíno people were the first known inhabitants of the island, and were later forced into extinction by the Spanish colonists. The Taíno were an Arawak-speaking people who had come from South America approximately 10,000 years ago. The Taíno were decimated by the Spanish colonists in the first few years after Columbus' arrival in 1492, with the population falling from an estimated 400,000 to 8,000 in a few years. The Taíno were forced into slavery and their culture was largely destroyed.
ref: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE. Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.

src: Laskettelulajit, joita ovat laskettelu ja lumilautailu, ovat suosittuja urheilulajeja, joissa lasketaan lumista maata alas suksilla tai jalkoihin kiinnitetyllä lumilaudalla. Laskettelu on tärkeä matkailuaktiviteetti, ja monet toisinaan hiihtopummeiksi kutsutut harrastajat suunnittelevat kokonaisia lomia tietyssä kohteessa laskettelun ympärille. Hiihtäminen on ajatuksena hyvin vanha – hiihtäjiä esittäviä luolamaalauksia on tehty jo vuonna 5000 eKr.! Alppihiihto urheiluna juontaa juurensa ainakin 1600-luvulle, ja vuonna 1861 norjalaiset avasivat ensimmäisen vapaa-ajan hiihtokeskuksen Australiaan.
mt: Downhill skiing and snowboarding are popular sports in which people ski or snowboard down snow-covered hills. Skiing is an important tourist activity, and many casual skiers, sometimes called snow bunnies, plan entire vacations around skiing at a particular resort. Skiing as a sport is thought to date back at least to 5000 BC, as cave paintings of skiers have been found from that time! Alpine skiing as a sport dates back to at least the 1600s, and in 1861 Norwegians opened the first ski resort in Australia.
ref: "Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet. Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as ""ski bums,"" planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location. The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC! Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia."

src: Itä-Afrikan saaret sijaitsevat Intian valtameressä Afrikan itärannikon edustalla. Madagaskar on niistä selvästi isoin ja luontonsa puolesta kuin oma mantereensa. Suurin osa pienemmistä saarista on itsenäisiä valtioita tai osa Ranskaa, ja ne tunnetaan ylellisinä rantakohteina. Arabit toivat maihin mukanaan myös islamin, ja se sai Komoreilla ja Mayottella paljon tuulta siipiensä alle. Euroopan vaikutus ja kolonialismi alkoivat 1400-luvulla, kun portugalilainen tutkimusmatkailija Vasco da Gama löysi merireitin Euroopasta Intiaan.
mt: The islands of East Africa are located in the Indian Ocean off the east coast of Africa. Madagascar is the largest of these islands and is also the most natural of its own continent. Most of the smaller islands are independent states or part of France, and they are known as luxurious beach destinations. Arabs brought Islam along with them, and it got a lot of wind under its wings in Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, when Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama discovered a sea route from Europe to India.
ref: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.

src: Perinteen mukaan pääsiäisyö vietetään hereillä jossakin aukeassa paikassa auringonnousun näkemiseksi. Tälle perinteelle on tietenkin olemassa kristillisiä teologisia selityksiä, mutta kyseessä voi hyvinkin olla kristinuskoa edeltävä kevät- ja hedelmällisyysrituaali. Perinteisemmät kirkot toimittavat usein pääsiäisyön messun pääsiäisviikonlopun lauantai-iltana. Seurakunta puhkeaa usein juhlimaan keskiyön hetkellä juhlistaakseen Kristuksen ylösnousemusta.
mt: According to tradition, Easter Eve is spent outdoors in some open place to see the sunrise. This tradition of course has Christian theological explanations, but it may well be a pre-Christian spring and fertility ritual. Traditional churches often hold an Easter Eve service on the Saturday evening of Easter weekend. The congregation often celebrates by celebrating at midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.
ref: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise. There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual. More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.

src: Ecuador vaatii, että Kuuban kansalaiset ovat saaneet kutsukirjeen ennen saapumista Ecuadoriin kansainvälisten lentoasemien tai maatarkastusasemien kautta. Ecuadorin ulkoministeriön täytyy laillistaa kirje, ja sen on täytettävä tietyt vaatimukset. Vaatimukset on tarkoitettu tekemään maiden välisestä muuttovirrasta järjestelmällisen. Kuuban kansalaisten, joilla on Yhdysvaltojen työ- ja oleskelulupa, tulee käydä Ecuadorin konsulaatissa saadakseen vapautuksen tästä vaatimuksesta. Passin on oltava voimassa vähintään 6 kuukautta matkan jälkeen. Oleskelun pituuden todistamiseen tarvitaan paluulippu tai jatkoyhteyden lippu.
mt: Ecuador demands that Cubans have received an invitation letter before arriving in Ecuador through international airports or border checkpoints. The letter must be legalized by Ecuador's Ministry of Foreign Affairs and meet certain requirements. The requirements are intended to make the flow of migrants between countries systematic. Cubans with a US work and stay permit must go to the Ecuadorian consulate to get exemption from this requirement. The passport must be valid for at least 6 months after the trip. Proof of the length of stay requires a return ticket or a ticket for further connection.
ref: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.

src: Silmälasit voivat olla halvempia ulkomailla, erityisesti matalan tulotason maissa, joissa työvoimakustannukset ovat pienemmät. Kannattaa hankkia näöntarkastus kotiin, etenkin jos vakuutus kattaa sen, ja ottaa resepti mukaan noudettavaksi muualta. Sellaisilta alueilta saatavissa luksusmerkkikehyksissä saattaa olla kaksi ongelmaa: osa voi olla väärennöksiä, ja oikeat maahantuodut kehykset voivat olla kalliimpia kuin kotona.
mt: Eyeglasses can be cheaper abroad, especially in low-income countries where labor costs are lower. It is worth getting an eye exam at home, especially if the insurance covers it, and taking the prescription with you. From such areas, luxury brand frames may have two problems: some may be fakes, and the real imported frames may be more expensive than at home.
ref: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower. Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere. High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.

src: Falklandsaarten virallinen valuutta on Falklandin punta (FKP), jonka arvo on sidottu vastaamaan Englannin puntaa (GBP). Rahaa voi vaihtaa vain saarten ainoassa pankissa, joka sijaitsee Stanleyssä, FIC West -kauppaa vastapäätä. Englannin punnat käyvät pääsääntöisesti kaikkialla saarilla, ja Stanleyssa käyvät usein myös luottokortit ja Yhdysvaltojen dollarit. Luottokortit eivät todennäköisesti kelpaa ulkosaarilla, vaikka Ison-Britannian ja Yhdysvaltojen valuutat voivatkin olla käypiä. Selvitä käypä maksutapa kysymällä omistajilta etukäteen. Falklandsaarten valuutan vaihtaminen itse saarten ulkopuolella on miltei mahdotonta, joten vaihda rahasi ennen saarilta lähtemistä.
mt: Falkland Islands' official currency is the Falkland pound (FKP), which is pegged to the British pound (GBP). The money can only be exchanged at the island's only bank, which is located in Stanley, across the street from FIC West. British pounds are generally accepted throughout the islands, and in Stanley, credit cards and U.S. dollars are often accepted as well. Credit cards are unlikely to be accepted off the main island, but British and U.S. currency may be accepted. Check with the owner before accepting payment. Exchanging Falkland Islands' currency outside the islands is nearly impossible, so exchange your money before leaving the islands.
ref: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted. On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method. It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.

Credit cards are unlikely to be accepted off the main island, but British and U.S. currency may be accepted. Check with the owner before accepting payment. Exchanging Falkland Islands' currency outside the islands is nearly impossible, so exchange your money before leaving the islands.
ref: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted. On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method. It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.

src: Useimmissa temppeleissä järjestetään vuotuinen juhla marraskuun lopun ja toukokuun puolivaiheen välillä. Ajankohta riippuu kunkin temppelin omasta vuosikalenterista. Useimmat temppelijuhlat järjestetään osana sen vuosipäivää, temppelin ylimmän jumalolennon syntymäpäivän kunniaksi tai minkä tahansa muun temppeliin liittyvän tärkeän tapahtuman yhteydessä. Keralan temppelijuhlia on todella mielenkiintoista seurata, koska niihin kuuluu säännöllisenä kulkueena koristeltuja norsuja, temppeliorkesteri ja muita juhlallisuuksia.
mt: Most temples hold an annual festival in November and May. The timing depends on the temple's own calendar. Most temple festivals are held as part of its annual day, the birth anniversary of the temple's highest deity, or any other important event related to the temple. Kerala temple festivals are very interesting to watch, as they include a regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.
ref: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar. Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple. Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.

src: Itsestään selvä tapa lentää ensimmäisessä tai business-luokassa on maksaa iso setelitukko rahaa tästä etuoikeudesta (tai ehkä mieluummin antaa firmasi tehdä sen puolestasi). Se ei kuitenkaan onnistu halvalla: karkean nyrkkisäännön mukaan voit odottaa maksavasi business-luokasta jopa nelinkertaisen hinnan turistiluokkaan verrattuna ja ykkösluokasta yksitoistakertaisen hinnan! Suorilla lennoilla paikasta A paikkaan B ei yleisesti ottaen kannata edes etsiä alennuksia businessluokan tai ensimmäisen luokan paikoille. Lentoyhtiöt tietävät, että on olemassa tietty lentomatkustajien ydinryhmä, joka on valmis maksamaan maltaita päästäkseen jonnekin nopeasti ja mukavasti, ja veloittavat sen mukaisesti.
mt: 1. It is obvious that the cheapest way to fly in first or business class is to pay a lot of money for this privilege (or perhaps you would prefer to have your company do it for you). However, this does not come cheap: a rough rule of thumb is that you can expect to pay up to eleven times the price of a tourist class ticket for a business class ticket and up to twelve times the price of a first class ticket! On direct flights from A to B, there is no need to look for discounts on first or business class tickets. Airlines know that there is a core group of travelers who are willing to pay a lot to get somewhere quickly and comfortably, and they charge accordingly.
ref: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you). However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class! Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.

src: Sellaiset lentoyhtiöt kuin Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways ja Turkish Airlines ovat laajentaneet huomattavasti palveluitaan Afrikkaan ja tarjoavat jatkoyhteyksiä moniin Afrikan tärkeimpiin kaupunkeihin kilpailukykyisempään hintaan kuin eurooppalaiset lentoyhtiöt. Turkish Airlines lentää 39 kohteeseen 30 Afrikan maassa (vuoden 2014 tilanne). Jos sinulla on ylimääräistä matka-aikaa, kannattaa tarkistaa, kuinka Afrikan matkan kokonaishinta vertautuu maailmanympärysmatkan hintaan. Älä unohda lisätä lisäviisumeista, lentokenttätakseista, maakuljetuksesta jne. aiheutuvia ylimääräisiä kaikissa niissä Afrikan ulkopuolella olevissa paikoissa.
mt: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways and Turkish Airlines have expanded their services to Africa significantly and offer connections to many of Africa's major cities at a more competitive price than European airlines. If you have extra time, consider how the total cost of an African trip compares to the total cost of a world tour. Don't forget to add visa fees, airport taxes, ground transportation, etc. in all those places outside of Africa.
ref: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines. Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014. If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare. Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.

src: Ruoan ostaminen valintamyymälästä on yleensä halvin tapa tulla ravituksi. Ilman ruoanlaittomahdollisuuksia vaihtoehdot kuitenkin rajoittuvat valmisruokaan. Valintamyymälöiden valmisaterioiden kirjo alkaa monipuolistua yhä enemmän. Osassa on tarjolla jopa mikroaaltouuni tai muita tapoja lämmittää ruokaa. Joissakin maissa tai kauppatyypeissä on vähintään yksi ravintola, usein melko rento ja kohtuuhintainen.
mt: Buying food at a supermarket is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking facilities, options are limited to prepared food. The range of prepared foods at supermarkets is growing. Some have microwaves or other ways to heat food. In some countries or types of stores, there is at least one restaurant, often quite relaxed and reasonably priced.
ref: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food. Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food. In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.

src: Belgiassa ja Sveitsissä puhutut ranskan muodot eroavat hieman Ranskassa puhutusta ranskasta, mutta ne ovat tarpeeksi samanlaisia ollakseen keskenään ymmärrettäviä. Erityisesti ranskankielisen Belgian ja Sveitsin numerojärjestelmässä on hienoisia omituisuuksiaan, jotka poikkeavat Ranskassa puhutusta ranskasta, ja joidenkin sanojen ääntäminen poikkeaa hieman. Kaikki ranskaa puhuvat belgialaiset ja sveitsiläiset ovat kuitenkin oppineet koulussa standardiranskaa, joten he kyllä ymmärtävät sinua, vaikka käyttäisit normaalia ranskalaista numerojärjestelmää.
mt: In Belgium and Switzerland, the French spoken is slightly different from the French spoken in France, but they are close enough to be mutually intelligible.  Especially the French number system in Belgium and Switzerland has some minor peculiarities that differ from the French spoken in France, and some words are pronounced slightly differently.  However, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss have learned standard French in school, so they will understand you, even if you use the normal French number system.
ref: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible. In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different. Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

src: Vain muutama lentoyhtiö tarjoaa edelleen ns. suruhintoja, joiden ansiosta viime hetken hautajaismatkat tulevat hieman halvemmiksi. Niitä tarjoaviin lentoyhtiöihin kuuluvat Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa Yhdysvalloista ja Kanadasta lähteville lennoille sekä Westjet. Kaikissa tapauksissa varaus tulee tehdä puhelimitse suoraan lentoyhtiön kanssa.
mt: Only a few airlines still offer "bereavement fares", which make last-minute funeral trips a little cheaper. Airlines offering these fares include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights from the United States and Canada, and Westjet. In all cases, reservations must be made by phone directly with the airline.
ref: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel. Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.

src: GPS-navigointisovellusten käyttäminen älypuhelimella voi olla helpoin ja kätevin tapa suunnistaa, kun et ole kotimaassasi. Siinä voi säästää rahaa verrattuna uusien karttojen ostamiseen GPS-paikanninta varten, kokonaan uuden GPS-laitteen ostamiseen tai sellaisen vuokraamiseen autovuokraamosta. Jos puhelimessasi ei ole datayhteyttä tai kun se on datayhteyden kantaman ulkopuolella, niiden suorituskyky voi olla rajallinen tai olematon.
mt: Using GPS navigation apps on a smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when you are not in your home country. It can save money compared to buying new maps for GPS navigation, buying or renting a new GPS device. If your phone does not have data connectivity or when it is outside the range of data connectivity, their performance can be limited or nonexistent.
ref: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country. It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company. If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.

src: Galapagossaarten kohteet ja eläimistön näkee parhaiten veneellä, aivan kuten Charles Darwin teki vuonna 1835. Galapagossaarten vesillä liikennöi yli 60 risteilyalusta, ja niiden koko vaihtelee kahdeksasta sataan matkustajaan. Useimmat ihmiset varaavat paikkansa hyvissä ajoin etukäteen (koska alukset ovat yleensä täynnä huippusesongin aikaan). Varmista, että virkailija, jonka kautta teet varauksen, on Galapagos-asiantuntija, joka tietää paljon erilaisista laivoista. Näin varmistat, että löydät parhaiten omia kiinnostuksen kohteitasi ja/tai rajoitteitasi vastaavan aluksen.
mt: The best way to see the Galapagos Islands and their wildlife is by boat, just as Charles Darwin did in 1835. There are over 60 cruise ships in Galapagos waters, ranging from eight to 100 passengers. Most people book their trips well in advance (as the ships are usually full during peak season). Make sure that the person you book with is a Galapagos expert who knows a lot about different boats. This way you can make sure you find the boat that best suits your interests and/or restrictions.
ref: Seeing the sites and wildlife of the Galapagos is best done by boat, just as Charles Darwin did it in 1835. Over 60 cruise ships ply the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers. Most people book their place well in advance (as the boats are usually full during the high season). Be sure the agent through whom you book is a Galapagos specialist with a good knowledge of a wide variety of ships. This will ensure that your particular interests and/or constraints are matched with the ship most suitable to them.

src: Kasinot yrittävät tyypillisesti parhaansa mukaan maksimoida asiakkaiden kuluttaman ajan ja rahan. Ikkunoita ja kelloja ei yleensä ole, ja uloskäyntien löytäminen voi olla vaikeaa. Niillä on usein erityisiä ruoka-, juoma- ja viihdetarjouksia asiakkaiden pitämiseksi hyvällä tuulella – ja kasinon tiloissa. Jotkin paikat tarjoavat alkoholijuomia talon piikkiin. Juopumus kuitenkin heikentää arvostelukykyä, ja kaikki hyvät uhkapelaajat tietävät selvänä pysymisen tärkeyden.
mt: Casinos typically try to maximize the time and money spent by their customers. There are usually no clocks or windows, and finding exits can be difficult. They often have special food, drink, and entertainment offerings to keep customers in good spirits – and in the casino's facilities. Some places offer alcohol to go. However, intoxication reduces critical thinking, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.
ref: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find. They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise. Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.

src: "Kaikki substantiivit, ja lisäksi sana ""Sie"" eli ""te"", alkavat aina isolla alkukirjaimella, jopa lauseen keskellä. Tämä on tärkeä keino erottaa jotkin verbit esineistä. Se voi myös tehdä lukemisesta helpompaa, joskin kirjoittamista monimutkaistaa tarve selvittää, käytetäänkö verbiä tai adjektiivia substantivoidussa muodossa."
mt: "All substantives, and also the word "Sie" meaning "you", begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish some verbs from substantives. It can also make reading easier, though it may complicate writing to determine whether a verb or adjective is being used in a substantivized form."
ref: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects. It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.

Se voi myös tehdä lukemisesta helpompaa, joskin kirjoittamista monimutkaistaa tarve selvittää, käytetäänkö verbiä tai adjektiivia substantivoidussa muodossa."

src: "Monissa osissa maailmaa vilkuttaminen on ystävällinen ele, joka merkitsee tervehtimistä. Kuitenkin Malesiassa ja ainakin maaseudun malesialaisten keskuudessa se tarkoittaa ""tule tänne"" vähän niin kuin eräissä länsimaissa käytettävä ele, jossa etusormea taivutetaan vartaloa kohti, ja sitä tulisikin käyttää ainoastaan siihen tarkoitukseen. Samantapaisesti brittimatkailija voi Espanjassa sekoittaa hyvästiksi vilkutuksen, jossa kämmen on ‎vilkuttajaan päin (eikä suinkaan vilkutettavaan päin), pyynnöksi tulla takaisin.‎"
mt: "In many parts of the world, winking is a friendly gesture that means hello. However, in Malaysia and at least in rural Malaysians, it means "come here" a little like the gesture in some Western countries where the thumb is bent towards the body and should only be used for that purpose. Similarly, a British tourist in Spain may confuse a friendly wave, where the palm is facing the winker (not at all to the winker), as a request to come back."
ref: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating ""hello."" However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."

ref: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating ""hello."" However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."

src: Jäätiköt eivät ole vakaita, vaan virtaavat alas vuorenrinnettä. Tämä aiheuttaa halkeamia ja railoja, jotka saattavat jäädä lumisiltojen peittämiksi. Jääluolien seinämät ja katot saattavat luhistua ja railot sulkeutua. Jäätiköiden reunoilla valtavat lohkareet irtoilevat, putoavat ja saattavat ponnahtaa tai vieriä kauemmas reunoilta.
mt: Glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain valleys. This causes crevasses and cracks, which may be covered by snowfall. The walls and roofs of ice caves may collapse and the cracks close. Huge boulders detach, fall, and may bounce or roll away from the edges of glaciers.
ref: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges. The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed. At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.

Jääluolien seinämät ja katot saattavat luhistua ja railot sulkeutua. Jäätiköiden reunoilla valtavat lohkareet irtoilevat, putoavat ja saattavat ponnahtaa tai vieriä kauemmas reunoilta.

src: Goma on matkailukaupunki Kongon demokraattisen tasavallan itäreunalla, lähellä Ruandaa. Vuonna 2002 Nyiragongo-tulivuoren laava tuhosi Goman ja hautasi alleen suurimman osan sen kaduista, etenkin kaupunkikeskustassa. Goma on kohtuullisen turvallinen, mutta kaikki retket kaupungin ulkopuolelle vaativat ennakkotutkimuksia Pohjois-Kivun maakunnassa jatkuvien taistelujen senhetkisen tilan selvittämiseksi. Kaupunki on myös Nyiragongo-tulivuorelle kiipeämisen lähtöpaikka. Sieltä löytää myös Afrikan halvimpia vuorigorillojen jäljittäjiä. Gomassa liikkumiseen voi käyttää boda-bodaa (moottoripyörätaksia). Tavallinen (paikallinen) taksa on noin 500 Kongon frangia lyhyestä ajomatkasta.
mt: Goma is a tourist city in the Democratic Republic of the Congo on the eastern border with Rwanda. In 2002, the lava of Nyiragongo volcano destroyed Goma and buried most of its streets, especially in the city center. Goma is relatively safe, but all trips outside the city require pre-research in the North Kivu province to determine the current situation of the ongoing battles. The city is also the starting point for climbing Nyiragongo volcano. It is also home to the cheapest gorilla trackers in Africa. You can use a boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to move around Goma. A normal (local) taxi is about 500 Congolese francs for a short ride.
ref: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of Congo in the extreme east near Rwanda. In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre. While Goma is reasonably safe, any visits outside of Goma should be researched to understand the state of the fighting that persists in the North Kivu province. The city is also the base to climb the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest Mountain Gorilla tracking in Africa. You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.

src: Leiriytyminen Grand Canyonin reunan alapuolella vaatii retkeilyluvan. Lupien määrää on rajoitettu kanjonin suojelemiseksi, ja ne tulevat saataville kuukauden ensimmäisenä päivänä neljä kuukautta ennen aloituskuukautta. Toisin sanoen retkeilylupa toukokuiselle alkamispäivämäärälle tulee saataville 1. tammikuuta. Suosituimpien alueiden, kuten Phantom Ranchin vieressä olevan Bright Angelin leiriytymisalueen, paikat täyttyvät yleensä jo ensimmäisenä päivänä, kun ne avautuvat varauksille. Ilman varausta saapuville on varattu rajallinen määrä lupia, jotka myönnetään saapumisjärjestyksessä.
mt: Camping below the rim of the Grand Canyon requires a permit. Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and they become available on the first day of the month four months before the start month. In other words, a permit for May 1 becomes available on January 1. The most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel campsite next to Phantom Ranch, fill up usually on the first day they become available for reservations. Without reservations, there is a limited number of permits available, which are given out in order of arrival.
ref: Any camping below the rim in Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit. Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month. Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan. Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations. There are a limited number permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first come, first served basis.

src: Jotkut hotelleista ovat peräisin höyryjunien ja valtamerialusten kulta-ajalta, 1800-luvulta tai 1900-luvun alusta, ajalta ennen toista maailmansotaa. Aikansa rikkaat ja kuuluisat ihmiset yöpyivät näissä hotelleissa, ja niissä oli usein tarjolla gourmetruokaa ja yöelämää. Vanhanaikaiset puitteet, nykyaikaisimpien mukavuuksien puuttuminen ja tietty arvokas iäkkyys kuuluvat myös niiden luonteeseen. Ne ovat yleensä yksityisomistuksessa, mutta toisinaan niihin majoitetaan vierailevia valtionpäämiehiä ja muita merkkihenkilöitä. Matkailija, jolla on kasoittain rahaa, voisi harkita maailmanympärilentoa, jota rytmittäisivät vierailut useissa näistä hotelleista.
mt: Some of the hotels are from the golden age of steamships and ocean liners, the 19th century or early 20th century, before the second world war. The rich and famous of their time stayed in these hotels, and they often had gourmet food and nightlife. Old-fashioned facilities, the absence of modern comforts, and a certain air of exclusivity are also part of their character. They are usually privately owned, but sometimes they are used to accommodate visiting heads of state and other notable figures. A tourist with plenty of money might consider a world tour, which would be punctuated by visits to several of these hotels.
ref: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries. These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife. The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character. While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries. A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.

src: "Eurooppaan vievien merenalaisten valokaapeliyhteyksien ja laajakaistasatelliitin ansiosta Grönlanti on hyvin verkossa, ja 93 prosentilla väestöstä onkin Internet-yhteys. Hotellissasi tai isännilläsi (mikäli yövyt vierasmajassa tai yksityisasunnossa) on todennäköisesti WiFi tai Internetiin kytketty tietokone, ja kaikista asutuskeskuksista löytyy Internet-kahvila tai paikka, jossa on julkinen WiFi-verkko. Kuten yllä mainittiin, vaikka sana eskimo hyväksytään yhä Yhdysvalloissa, monet arktiset kansat Yhdysvaltojen ulkopuolella, etenkin Kanadassa, pitävät sitä halventavana. Voit ehkä kuulla Grönlannin alkuperäisasukkaiden käyttävän tätä sanaa, mutta ulkomaalaisten tulisi silti välttää sen käyttöä. Grönlannin alkuperäisasukkaat kutsuvat itseään Kanadassa inuiiteiksi, ja Grönlannissa he käyttävät sanaa kalaalleq (monikko kalaallit), grönlantilainen. Rikollisuus ja ylipäätään pahat aikeet ulkomaalaisia kohtaan ovat Grönlannissa käytännössä tuntemattomia. Edes kaupungeissa ei ole ""huonomaineisia alueita"". Kylmä sää on ehkä ainut oikea vaara, jonka valmistautumaton kohtaa. Jos vierailet Grönlannissa kylmänä vuodenaikana (pitäen myös mielessä, että sen pohjoisissa osissa on kaikkein kylmintä), on ehdottoman tärkeää ottaa mukaan tarpeeksi lämmintä vaatetusta. Kesän pitkät päivät saattavat aiheuttaa vaikeuksia riittävän unen saannissa ja niihin liittyviä terveysongelmia. Kesällä kannattaa myös varoa hyttysiä. Vaikka ne eivät kanna tauteja, ne voivat olla ärsyttäviä."
mt: 93% of the population has Internet access. In your hotel or with your host (if you are staying in a guesthouse or private home) you will likely have WiFi or a computer connected to the Internet, and there is an Internet cafe or public WiFi in every settlement. As mentioned above, Eskimo is still accepted in the United States, but many Arctic peoples outside the United States, especially in Canada, consider it derogatory. You may hear Greenlandic indigenous people use this word, but foreigners should still avoid using it. Greenlandic indigenous people call themselves Inuit in Canada, and in Greenland they use the word kalaalleq (plural kalaallit), Greenlandic. Crime and violence against foreigners are virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in cities there are no ""bad neighborhoods"". Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger that an unprepared person will encounter. If you visit Greenland during the cold season (keeping in mind that the northern parts are the coldest), it is absolutely essential to bring enough warm clothing. The long summer days may cause problems in getting enough sleep and related health problems. In the summer, you should also beware of mosquitoes. Although they do not carry diseases, they can be annoying.
ref: "Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access. Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi. As mentioned above, though the word ""Eskimo"" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners. The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland. Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no ""rough areas."" Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing. The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues. During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating."

src: Jardín de la Unión. Tila rakennettiin atriumiksi 1600-luvun luostariin, jonka ainoa jäljellä oleva rakennus on Templo de San Diego. Se toimii nykyisin keskusaukiona, ja siellä on aina paljon vilinää vuorokauden ympäri. Useat ravintolat ympäröivät puutarhaa, ja useina iltapäivinä sekä iltoina päähuvimajassa järjestetään ilmaisia konsertteja. Callejon del Beso (Suudelman kuja). Kahdesta, vain 69 senttimetrin päässä toisistaan olevasta parvekkeesta kerrotaan vanhaa rakkaustarua. Lapset kertovat koko tarinan vastineeksi muutamasta kolikosta.
mt: Jardín de la Unión. The site was built as an atrium in a 17th century monastery, the only remaining building of which is the Templo de San Diego. It now serves as a central courtyard, and is always bustling throughout the day and night. Several restaurants surround the garden, and free concerts are often held in the gazebo on weekends. Callejon del Beso (Kissing Alley). Two balconies, only 69 centimeters apart, are said to be the site of an old love story. Children tell the whole story in exchange for a few coins.
ref: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for a 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the sole surviving building. It now functions as the central plaza, and always has a lot of things going on, day and night. There are a number of restaurants surrounding the garden, and in the afternoons and evening there free concerts are often given from the central gazebo. Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is home of an old love legend. For a few pennies some children will tell you the story.

src: Patikointi on ulkoilmaharraste, joka koostuu kävelystä luonnonympäristössä, usein vaellusreiteillä. Päiväpatikoinnilla tarkoitetaan etäisyyksiä, jotka vaihtelevat alle mailista pidempiin matkoihin, jos ne pystytään kulkemaan yhden päivän aikana. Päiväpatikointi helpolla reitillä vaatii hyvin vähän valmisteluja ja sopii kelle tahansa kohtuukuntoiselle. Pienten lasten kanssa liikkuvat saattavat tarvita enemmän valmisteluja, mutta päivä ulkona on helposti toteutettavissa jopa vauvojen ja leikki-ikäisten kanssa.
mt: Hiking is an outdoor activity involving walking in natural environments, often in mountain, forest, or other natural terrain. Day hiking is a form of hiking that does not require an overnight stay. Day hiking is a popular activity with people from all walks of life, and is suitable for people of all ages. It is also a popular activity for families with small children.
ref: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails. Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day. For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them. Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.

Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day. For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them. Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.

src: Jyrkät vuonot ja laaksot, jotka muuttuvat yhtäkkiä jokseenkin tasaiseksi ylängöksi, ovat tyypillisiä Norjalle. Näistä tasangoista käytetään usein nimeä vidde, joka tarkoittaa laajaa ja avointa puutonta aluetta, rajatonta lakeutta. Rogalandissa ja Agderissa niihin viitataan yleensä sanalla hei, joka tarkoittaa puutonta, usein kanervan peittämää nummea.
mt: The steep valleys and plateaus that suddenly become almost flat uplands are typical of Norway. These plateaus are often called vidde, which means a large and open treeless area, unlimited land. In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called hei, which means treeless, often heather-covered moorland.
ref: "Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau. These plateaus are often referred to as ""vidde"" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse. In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called ""hei"" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather."

src: Vuoristoasemien matkailusesonki on yleensä huipussaan Intian kesän aikana. Niissä on talvella kuitenkin erilaista kauneutta ja hurmaavuutta monien vuoristoasemien saadessa reippaasti lunta ja tarjotessa tilaisuuden hiihtämisen ja lumilautailun kaltaisille harrastuksille.
mt: The tourist season in the mountain stations is usually at its peak during the Indian summer. However, there is a different kind of beauty and charm in the winter months when many mountain stations receive heavy snowfall and offer opportunities for skiing and snowboarding.
ref: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer. However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.

src: Vuoristoasemien matkailusesonki on yleensä huipussaan Intian kesän aikana. Niissä on talvella kuitenkin erilaista kauneutta ja hurmaavuutta monien vuoristoasemien saadessa reippaasti lunta ja tarjotessa tilaisuuden hiihtämisen ja lumilautailun kaltaisille harrastuksille.
mt: The tourist season in the mountain stations is usually at its peak during the Indian summer. However, there is a different kind of beauty and charm in the winter months when many mountain stations receive heavy snowfall and offer opportunities for skiing and snowboarding.
ref: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer. However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.

src: Voit olla varma, että kun pääset venesatamaan, kaikki on melko itsestään selvää. Tapaat muita veneliftareita, ja he jakavat tietonsa kanssasi. Käytännössä laitat ilmoituksia, joissa tarjoat apua, kuljeskelet telakoilla, lähestyt ihmisiä, jotka puhdistavat jahtejaan, yrität keskustella baarissa olevien merimiesten kanssa jne. Yritä puhua niin monien ihmisten kanssa kuin mahdollista. Pian kaikki tuntevat sinut ja antavat vinkkejä siitä, mihin veneeseen tarvitaan avustajia.
mt: You can be sure that when you get to the marina, everything is pretty self-explanatory. You meet other boat lifters, and they share their knowledge with you. In practice, you post offers, where you offer help, you walk around the docks, you approach people who are cleaning their boats, you try to talk to sailors in the bar etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. Soon everyone knows you and gives tips on which boat needs help.
ref: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you. Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.

Yritä puhua niin monien ihmisten kanssa kuin mahdollista. Pian kaikki tuntevat sinut ja antavat vinkkejä siitä, mihin veneeseen tarvitaan avustajia.

After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.

src: Hongkongin saari antaa Hongkongin alueelle nimensä, ja se on monien matkailijoiden pääkohteena. Hongkongin siluetin muodostavaa rakennusten kulkuetta on verrattu kimaltavaan pylväskaavioon, joka tulee parhaiten ilmi Victorian sataman vedessä. Hongkongin parhaat puolet näkee lähtemällä saarelta ja suuntaamalla vastapäätä sijaitsevalle Kowloonin satama-alueelle. Valtaosa Hongkongin saaren kaupunkialueesta sijaitsee pohjoisrannan täpötäyteen rakennetulla täyttömaalla. Juuri tämän paikan brittiläiset siirtomaaisännät ottivat omakseen, ja jos hakee merkkejä alueen siirtomaahistoriasta, se on hyvä paikka aloittaa.
mt: Hong Kong Island gives its name to the Hong Kong area, and is the main destination for many tourists. The line of skyscrapers that forms the silhouette of Hong Kong is best seen from the water in Victoria Harbour. The best parts of Hong Kong Island are seen by leaving the island and heading to the opposite side of the harbour to Kowloon. Most of the city of Hong Kong Island is built on reclaimed land on the north shore. This is where the British colonial masters took up residence, and if you are looking for signs of the area's colonial history, this is a good place to start.
ref: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus. The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite. The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.

src: Jalustimet ovat ratsastajan jalkatuet, jotka roikkuvat satulan kummallakin puolella. Ratsastaja saa niistä enemmän vakautta, mutta niihin voi liittyä turvallisuushuolia, koska ratsastajan jalat saattavat takertua niihin. Jos ratsastaja putoaa hevosen selästä, mutta jalka jää kiinni jalustimeen, karkaava hevonen saattaa käydä vetämään häntä perässään. Tämän riskin supistamiseksi voidaan ryhtyä erinäisiin varotoimenpiteisiin. Ensinnäkin useimmat ratsastajat käyttävät korollisia ratsastussaappaita, joissa on sileä ja varsin kapea pohja. Joissakin satuloissa, etenkin englantilaisissa, on turvatanko, jonka ansiosta jalustinhihna irtoaa satulasta, jos putoava ratsastaja vetää sitä taaksepäin.
mt: Stirrups are the rider's leg supports that hang from the saddle on both sides. The rider gets more stability from them, but there are safety concerns, as the rider's legs may get stuck in them. If the rider falls off the horse's back, but the leg gets stuck in the stirrup, the running horse may drag the rider along. To reduce this risk, various safety measures can be taken. First of all, most riders use stirrup leathers with smooth and relatively narrow bottoms. In some saddles, especially English, there is a safety strap that allows the stirrup strap to come off the saddle if the falling rider pulls it backwards.
ref: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them. If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole. Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.

src: Vieraanvaraisuusverkosto on järjestö, joka yhdistää matkailijat paikallisiin asukkaisiin niissä kaupungeissa, joissa he aikovat vierailla. Tällaiseen verkostoon voi yleensä liittyä vain täyttämällä nettilomakkeen, tosin jotkut verkostot tarjoavat tai vaativat lisävahvistuksen. Luettelo saatavilla olevista majoittajista järjestetään sitten paperisena ja/tai verkossa, ja joskus siihen kuuluu muiden matkustajien suosituksia ja arvosteluja. CouchSurfing perustettiin tammikuussa 2004, kun tietokoneohjelmoija Casey Fenton löysi halvan lennon Islantiin, mutta hänellä ei ollut majapaikkaa. Hän lähetti sähköpostia paikallisen yliopiston oppilaille ja sai valtavan määrän tarjouksia ilmaisesta majoituksesta.
mt: A hospitality network is an organization that connects travelers to local residents in the cities they plan to visit. Typically, one can only join such a network by filling out a web form, although some networks offer or require additional verification. A list of available hosts is then arranged either on paper or online, and sometimes includes the recommendations and reviews of other travelers. CouchSurfing was founded in January 2004, when computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland, but had no place to stay. He sent an email to students at the local university and received a huge number of offers of free accommodation.
ref: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit. Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification. A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay. He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.

src: Hostellit ovat pääosin nuorille matkailijoille – tyypillinen vieras on kaksissakymmenissään – mutta niistä voi usein löytää myös vanhempia matkailijoita. Lapsiperheet ovat harvinainen näky, mutta jotkut hostellit ottavat heitä vastaan yksityishuoneisiin.
mt: Hostels are mostly for young travelers – the typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travelers there as well. Family groups are a rare sight, but some hostels take them in private rooms.
ref: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too. Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels do allow them in private rooms.

src: Bumerangin heittäminen on suosittu taito, jonka monet matkailijat haluavat oppia. Jos haluat oppia heittämään bumerangia niin, että se palaa takaisin käteesi, varmista että sinulla on tähän tarkoitukseen soveltuva bumerangi. Useimmat Australiassa saatavilla olevat bumerangit eivät itse asiassa palaa takaisin. Aloittelijoiden on paras olla kokeilematta heittämistä tuulisissa
mt: Throwing a boomerang is a popular skill that many tourists want to learn. If you want to learn how to throw a boomerang so that it returns to you, make sure that you have a boomerang for this purpose. Most boomerangs available in Australia do not actually return. Beginners are best off not trying to throw them in windy conditions.
ref: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire. If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning. Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy

src: Koska saaria on valittavana 17 000, indonesialainen ruoka on yläkäsite, joka kattaa laajan valikoiman alueellisia ruokakulttuureja ympäri maata. Mutta mikäli käsitettä käytetään ilman lisämääritelmiä, sillä tarkoitetaan yleensä pääsaari Jaavan keski- ja itäosista lähtöisin olevaa ruokaa. Jaavalaista keittiötä on nykyään laajalti saatavilla koko saariston alueella, ja siihen kuuluu iso kattaus yksinkertaisesti maustettuja ruokalajeja. Jaavalaisten suosimiin aromeihin kuuluvat maapähkinät, chilit, sokeri (erityisesti jaavalainen kookossokeri) ja monenlaiset aromaattiset mausteet.
mt: 17,000 islands, Indonesian food is an umbrella term that covers a wide range of regional cuisines across the archipelago. However, if the term is used without further specification, it usually refers to food from the central and eastern parts of Java island. The Javanese cuisine is now widely available throughout the archipelago, and it includes a large variety of simply seasoned dishes. The Javanese favorites include peanuts, chilies, sugar (especially Javanese palm sugar) and various aromatic spices.
ref: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation. But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java. Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.

src: Tiedoksi niille, jotka eivät tunne lääketieteellistä sanastoa: sanoilla tartuntatauti ja tarttuva tauti on eri merkitys. Tartuntatauti on patogeenin, kuten viruksen, bakteerin, sienen tai muun loisen aiheuttama tauti. Tarttuva tauti on sellainen, joka leviää helposti olemalla tartunnan saaneen henkilön lähellä. Monet viranomaiset vaativat maahan tulevilta vierailijoilta tai maasta lähteviltä asukkailta rokotusten ottamista useita eri tauteja vastaan. Vaatimukset saattavat usein riippua siitä, missä maissa matkailija on vieraillut tai aikoo vierailla.
mt: For those who don't know medical terminology: the term "infectious disease" means a disease caused by a pathogen such as a virus, bacteria, fungus or other microbe. The term "contagious disease" means a disease that spreads easily when in close contact with an infected person. Many officials require visitors to the country or residents leaving the country to have vaccinations against several diseases. Requirements may vary depending on the country the visitor has been to or is going to.
ref: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings. An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases. These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.

src: Henkilökohtaisten VPN-verkkojen tarjoajat ovat erinomainen tapa kiertää sekä poliittinen sensuuri että kaupallinen IP-geosuodatus. Ne ovat välityspalvelimia parempia useista syistä: ne reitittävät kaiken Internet-liikenteen uudelleen, eivät pelkästään http-liikennettä. Niiden kaistanleveys on usein suurempi ja palvelun laatu parempi. Ne ovat salattuja ja siten vaikeampia vakoilla.
mt: Personal VPN providers are a great way to circumvent both political censorship and commercial IP geo-blocking. They are better than proxies in many ways: they route all Internet traffic, not just HTTP traffic. Their bandwidth is usually larger and the service quality better. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.
ref: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering. They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http. They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.

src: Henkilökohtaisten VPN-verkkojen tarjoajat ovat erinomainen tapa kiertää sekä poliittinen sensuuri että kaupallinen IP-geosuodatus.
